content: over bring yarn in between and then over right hand needle ws= wrong side rs= right side bor=beg of round m1l= with left needle pick up bar between st just worked and next st on left needle from front to back and knit through the back m1r= with left needle pick up bar between st just worked and next st on left needle from back to front and knit through the front wyif = with yarn in front wyib = with yarn in back sl = slip _____________________________________________ _____________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission
